# BNNSGraph.Builder.PoolingPadding

**Type Alias**

The padding that you use for pooling operations to specify zero-padding.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias PoolingPadding = BNNSGraph.Builder.ConvolutionPadding
```
title: BNNSGraph.Builder.PoolingPadding
